thread.title: Katy Perry Previews New Song 'Chained to the Rhythm' - Watch the New Teaser!
thread.title_full: Katy Perry Previews New Song 'Chained to the Rhythm' - Watch the New Teaser!

author: Just Jared
title: Katy Perry Previews New Song 'Chained to the Rhythm' - Watch the New Teaser!
text:
Katy Perry is getting ready to release her new song “Chained to the Rhythm” and she just shared a preview of the upcoming single!
“Why are we all so chained…” the 32-year-old singer captioned a video on Twitter which featured her ankle chained to a disco ball. She also teased the release date, which is Friday (February 10).
The newly blonde Katy is set to perform at the Grammys this weekend and it’s expected that she’ll sing this new song, which was reportedly written by Sia and produced by hitmaker Max Martin .
Why are we all so chained… #FRIDAYTHE10TH pic.twitter.com/DOo6zpe4dQ 
— KATY PERRY (@katyperry) February 7, 2017
